meanings.sent1: The puppy looked overloved with all the hugs and kisses.
meanings.sent2: The overloved teddy bear had patches from being hugged so much.
meanings.sent3: The overloved cake was covered in too many candles.
meanings.sent4: The garden was overloved with so many flowers, it seemed magical.
meanings.sent5: The overloved book had pages worn from being read over and over.

meanings.sent1: The overloved child was showered with gifts every day.
meanings.sent2: The overloved plant wilted from too much water.
meanings.sent3: The overloved phone had a cracked screen from being dropped so often.
meanings.sent4: The overloved song played on repeat until everyone got tired of it.
meanings.sent5: The overloved movie had a fan club dedicated to watching it every week.
